coreAttributes.name: Workout Power
coreAttributes.description: A plastic, turquoise drink bottle, of the sort typically used during exercise. A small sticker on the bottom names the pre-filled energy drink 'Workout Power', and declares that it's the ideal formula for hyena-morphs looking to gain muscle.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first popping up the cap, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the bottle of Workout Power up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. A very artificial smell of tropical fruits rises from the opening, and as [npc.she] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(start)] drinking the cool liquid, [npc.she] [npc.verb(discover)] that it tastes exactly the same as its smell.
